TestDescriptor.Name: Test code generation for collections in Java 5.0, where enumerate* and iterate* methds are created.
TestDescriptor.Author: Werner Guttmann
TestDescriptor.Comment: The generated clas(es) should include various iterate*() and enumerate*() methods, and as some of those classes are part of a type hierarchy, with Java 5.0 the return type of these methods should carry an '? extends' in their type definition.
